Title: Breach
Description:
As much as I'd love to hunt Xal'atath down, our first priority must be securing civilians. 

Rescue whoever you can and tell them to head to the landing nearby. I'll find mages to teleport everyone to safety.
ObjectivesText: Send civilians to the landing for safety.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Talk to Alleria at Krasus Landing
RewardText: That's the first group evacuated. But we're not done yet.
